name: Salto Mobile
tag_list: mobile, tablet, iphone, android, ipad, apple, htc, samsung, social-media
overview:
Salto designs modern mobile applications that interact with their users thanks to the functionality and tight integration with social media.

Our apps are created in accordance with the most efficient standards of designing. Whether you’re looking for simple mobile solutions or an extensive application, we will do our best to make your vision come to life. We manage the full process - starting with the concept and strategy, through development and testing, ending with the promotion of the mobile product. We are always close to our client, being a partner who takes care of his needs during the entire application development process.

The Salto team is a group of people who share passion for innovation and a common look at the progress of new media channels. We have worked together on multiple digital projects at GONG and decided to create a seperate company dedicated to mobile solutions.
